person.persName: John E. Cosson (Pulaski Circuit Ct. Clk.)

body.p: Born in Kentucky in 1821. Married Emily Cosson. Druggist in Pulaski County in 1860. Postmaster in Somerset, Kentucky, from July 1861 to October 1861. Clerk of the Pulaski Circuit Court. Died in 1884.
